feature_defs.trigger: while you aren't wearing armor or wielding a shield
effects: Dance Virtuoso: you have advantage on Charisma (Performance) checks that involve dancing.
Unarmored Defense: your base AC equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Charisma modifier.
Agile Strikes: when you expend a use of Bardic Inspiration as part of an action, bonus action, or reaction, you can make one unarmed strike as part of that same action.

Bardic Damage: you can use Dexterity for unarmed strike attack rolls; when you deal damage with an unarmed strike, you can deal bludgeoning damage equal to your Bardic Inspiration die + your Dexterity modifier instead of the strike's normal damage (this roll doesn't expend the die).

feature_defs.trigger: when an enemy you can see ends its turn within 5 feet of you
effects: You can expend one use of Bardic Inspiration to move up to half your speed.
One ally of your choice within 30 feet can also move up to half their speed using their reaction.
None of this movement provokes opportunity attacks.

feature_defs.trigger: when you roll initiative and you don't have the incapacitated condition
effects: You can expend one use of Bardic Inspiration and roll the die.
You and each ally within 30 feet who can see or hear you gain a bonus to initiative equal to the number rolled.

feature_defs.trigger: when you are subjected to an effect that allows a Dexterity saving throw for half damage
effects: You take no damage on a successful save and only half damage on a failed save.
If creatures within 5 feet of you are making the same save, you can share this benefit with them for that save.
limits: You can't use this feature if you have the Incapacitated condition.
